planet.name: Kepler-208 c
KOI-671 c
KOI-671.02
KIC 7040629 c
KIC 7040629.02
planet.description: Kepler-208 c has been discovered by the Kepler spacecraft and was originally classified as a planet candidate. A new statistical analysis led by a team at NASA Ames Research Center has validated the planet with more than 99 percent confidence. Although many parameters of Kepler-208 c are still unknown, the object is highly unlikely to be a false positive.
